summary: Legal translation engine corrupted with mojibake and syntax breaks
details: Lint/tsc show src/lib/legal-translation/LegalTranslationEngine.ts contains corrupted Spanish strings (see lines ~330+) injected with mojibake bytes and stray quotes, producing 'Parsing error: ',' expected'. Any import of translateLegalText now fails and blocks builds.
next_action: Monitor translation module regressions and rerun mojibake check if new locales are ingested.
owner_notes: 2025-09-19: Repaired LegalTranslationEngine dictionary and reran lint/typecheck (typecheck blocked by unrelated errors).

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; see ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0003/lint-log.txt for eslint failure and ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0003/typecheck-log.txt for tsc errors.
Severity raised to critical after confirming mojibake corruption in LegalTranslationEngine.ts; inspect tail section for mojibake in ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0003/typecheck-log.txt.
Restored legal dictionary translations, ESLint clean; typecheck still failing globally (see artifact).
